title: Font suggestions
content: I am working on putting together new packaging for a management consulting corporation. It must appeal to a younger client base (18-25) while not alienating the existing client base (45-60 age bracket). The key words for the brand are ACTION, SUCCESS and WINNING. The current font used is Eras, which is not fresh although does have a sense of action. I would like to get any suggestions on a serif and sans-serif pair based on the above criteria. Any opinions are appreciated.
author: rikardr

comments.content: Something modern, something slightly bolder than usual. Hmm....
I like Avenir, but don't know that it is the best choice. I would like a font that has a full body--light, regular, bold, etc. One I was looking at is Pill Gothic. Another was Politica.
Axel for sans and Utopia for serif.
